solution_line_template: Each brick wall needs {bricks_per_row} x {rows_per_wall} = <<{bricks_per_row}*{rows_per_wall}={bricks_per_wall}>>{bricks_per_wall} bricks.
Thus, the {num_walls} walls need {bricks_per_wall} x {num_walls} = <<{bricks_per_wall}*{num_walls}={total_bricks}>>{total_bricks} bricks.
